The Trump Administration’s latest set of sanctions against North Korea has only served to worsen the already tense relations between the two countries. List three significant events that have happened recently in the US-India relationship. The US has provided financial assistance to India for decades, and the US-India relationship continues to deepen. In 2005, the US-India nuclear deal opened the door for the US to become a major supplier of civilian nuclear power and opened up opportunities for the US technology sector. More recently, India has purchased military equipment from the US and the two countries have deepened their partnership on defence and security issues.
